mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (user_id, restaurant_id, status, comment) VALUES (#{userId}, #{restaurantId}, #{status}, #{comment})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS recordId, r.restaurant_id AS restaurantId, rest.name AS restaurantName, r.status, r.comment FROM record r JOIN restaurant rest ON r.restaurant_id = rest.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.status = #{status} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET status = #{status}, comment = #{comment}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{recordId}
